languages.text: {n}Лицо контрабандиста трескается кривым провалом рта.{/n} "Я знал, знал, что даже под страхом смерти своих щенков ты выкинешь нечто подобное, Хейдари! Притащиться сюда с {mf|ним|ней}?" {n}Фалько тыкает в вашу сторону.{/n} "Мы оба знаем, как теперь это закончится".

traits.locale_text: {n}Лицо контрабандиста трескается кривым провалом рта.{/n} "Я знал, знал, что даже под страхом смерти своих щенков ты выкинешь нечто подобное, Хейдари! Притащиться сюда с {mf|ним|ней}?" {n}Фалько тыкает в вашу сторону.{/n} "Мы оба знаем, как теперь это закончится".
traits.speaker: Falco

languages.text: {n}The smuggler's face seems to cleave in two as he opens his mouth in a twisted snarl.{/n} "I knew it, even with your pack of whelps on the line, I knew you'd pull something like this, Heydari! You show up here with {mf|him|her}?" {n}Falco points at you.{/n} "We both know how this is going to end now."

You show up here with {mf|him|her}?" {n}Falco points at you.{/n} "We both know how this is going to end now."

languages.text: {n}口をひねってうなり声を上げる密輸業者の顔は、真っ二つに裂けたように見える。{/n}「予想通りだ。たとえお前の犬コロの群れがかかってたとしても、お前ならこうするだろうと思ってたよ、ヘイダリ！お前ははそいつと一緒にここに来たのか？」{n}ファルコがあなたを指差す。{/n}「本当は二人とも、この争いの結末は知ってるはずだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The smuggler's face seems to cleave in two as he opens his mouth in a twisted snarl.{/n} "I knew it, even with your pack of whelps on the line, I knew you'd pull something like this, Heydari! You show up here with {mf|him|her}?" {n}Falco points at you.{/n} "We both know how this is going to end now."

traits.locale_text: {n}口をひねってうなり声を上げる密輸業者の顔は、真っ二つに裂けたように見える。{/n}「予想通りだ。たとえお前の犬コロの群れがかかってたとしても、お前ならこうするだろうと思ってたよ、ヘイダリ！お前ははそいつと一緒にここに来たのか？」{n}ファルコがあなたを指差す。{/n}「本当は二人とも、この争いの結末は知ってるはずだ」
traits.speaker: Falco

languages.text: {n}法尔科张开嘴，发出了扭曲的咆哮声，他的脸看起来像是被劈成了两半。{/n}“我早就知道！就算你这群小崽子马上就要没命了，我也知道，你肯定会玩这种手段，海达利！你居然敢带着{mf|他|她}一起过来？”{n}法尔科指着你。{/n}“你我都很清楚，这件事情会怎么收场。”
languages.original_text: {n}The smuggler's face seems to cleave in two as he opens his mouth in a twisted snarl.{/n} "I knew it, even with your pack of whelps on the line, I knew you'd pull something like this, Heydari! You show up here with {mf|him|her}?" {n}Falco points at you.{/n} "We both know how this is going to end now."

traits.locale_text: {n}法尔科张开嘴，发出了扭曲的咆哮声，他的脸看起来像是被劈成了两半。{/n}“我早就知道！就算你这群小崽子马上就要没命了，我也知道，你肯定会玩这种手段，海达利！你居然敢带着{mf|他|她}一起过来？”{n}法尔科指着你。{/n}“你我都很清楚，这件事情会怎么收场。”
traits.speaker: Falco

languages.text: {n}La cara del contrabandista parece partirse en dos mientras abre la boca con un gruñido retorcido.{/n} «Es que lo sabía. Tienes a tus cachorros en la cuerda floja, pero ¡tú sigues con tus jueguecitos, Heydari! ¿Cómo apareces aquí con {mf|él|ella}?». {n}Falco te señala.{/n} «Ahora ambos sabemos cómo va a acabar esto».
languages.original_text: {n}The smuggler's face seems to cleave in two as he opens his mouth in a twisted snarl.{/n} "I knew it, even with your pack of whelps on the line, I knew you'd pull something like this, Heydari! You show up here with {mf|him|her}?" {n}Falco points at you.{/n} "We both know how this is going to end now."

traits.locale_text: {n}La cara del contrabandista parece partirse en dos mientras abre la boca con un gruñido retorcido.{/n} «Es que lo sabía. Tienes a tus cachorros en la cuerda floja, pero ¡tú sigues con tus jueguecitos, Heydari! ¿Cómo apareces aquí con {mf|él|ella}?». {n}Falco te señala.{/n} «Ahora ambos sabemos cómo va a acabar esto».
traits.speaker: Falco

languages.text: {n}Le visage du contrebandier semble se fendre en deux alors que sa bouche laisse échapper un grognement.{/n} « Je le savais. Ta bande d'avortons a le canon sur la tempe, mais tu tentes quand même de me la faire à l'envers, Heydari ! Tu as le culot de te pointer ici avec {mf|lui|elle} ! » {n}Falco vous désigne de la main.{/n} « Maintenant, on sait très bien comment tout ça va se finir. »
languages.original_text: {n}The smuggler's face seems to cleave in two as he opens his mouth in a twisted snarl.{/n} "I knew it, even with your pack of whelps on the line, I knew you'd pull something like this, Heydari! You show up here with {mf|him|her}?" {n}Falco points at you.{/n} "We both know how this is going to end now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage du contrebandier semble se fendre en deux alors que sa bouche laisse échapper un grognement.{/n} « Je le savais. Ta bande d'avortons a le canon sur la tempe, mais tu tentes quand même de me la faire à l'envers, Heydari ! Tu as le culot de te pointer ici avec {mf|lui|elle} ! » {n}Falco vous désigne de la main.{/n} « Maintenant, on sait très bien comment tout ça va se finir. »
traits.speaker: Falco

languages.text: {n}Das Gesicht des Schmugglers scheint sich in zwei Hälften zu teilen, als er den Mund öffnet und faucht:{/n} "Ich wusste, dass Ihr so etwas abziehen würdet, selbst wenn Euer Rudel auf dem Spiel steht, Heydari! Ihr taucht tatsächlich mit {mf|ihm|ihr} hier auf?" {n}Falco zeigt auf dich.{/n} "Wir wissen beide, wie das jetzt enden wird."
languages.original_text: {n}The smuggler's face seems to cleave in two as he opens his mouth in a twisted snarl.{/n} "I knew it, even with your pack of whelps on the line, I knew you'd pull something like this, Heydari! You show up here with {mf|him|her}?" {n}Falco points at you.{/n} "We both know how this is going to end now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Gesicht des Schmugglers scheint sich in zwei Hälften zu teilen, als er den Mund öffnet und faucht:{/n} "Ich wusste, dass Ihr so etwas abziehen würdet, selbst wenn Euer Rudel auf dem Spiel steht, Heydari! Ihr taucht tatsächlich mit {mf|ihm|ihr} hier auf?"" {n}Falco zeigt auf dich.{/n} "Wir wissen beide, wie das jetzt enden wird."
traits.speaker: Falco

languages.text: {n}Kaçakçı, çirkin bir hırıltıyla ağzını açtığında yüzü ikiye ayrılmış gibi oluyor.{/n} "Biliyordum. Ucunda bu eniklerin hayatı olsa bile böyle bir numara çekeceğini biliyordum Heydari! Onu da mı getirdin?" {n}Falco seni işaret ediyor.{/n} "Şimdi olacakları ikimiz de iyi biliyoruz."
languages.original_text: {n}The smuggler's face seems to cleave in two as he opens his mouth in a twisted snarl.{/n} "I knew it, even with your pack of whelps on the line, I knew you'd pull something like this, Heydari! You show up here with {mf|him|her}?" {n}Falco points at you.{/n} "We both know how this is going to end now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kaçakçı, çirkin bir hırıltıyla ağzını açtığında yüzü ikiye ayrılmış gibi oluyor.{/n} "Biliyordum... Ucunda bu eniklerin hayatı bile olsa böyle bir numara çekeceğini biliyordum Heydari! Onu da mı getirdin?" {n}Falco seni işaret ediyor.{/n} "Şimdi olacakları ikimiz de iyi biliyoruz."
traits.speaker: Falco
